Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!  Great package! Great seller!
Reviews.Author: Bigtoona
Reviews.Content: Though Hurricane "Sandy" slowed things down a bit in transit, shipping prompt and packaging was superb.  The Imaging World did a great job.  I couldn't be more satisfied with their service.This was a fantastic package with a camera that takes great pictures and video.  We love it -- especially as new grandparents.  We can inflict those high quality images of our grandson on anyone at a moments notice!I noticed that one review complained of a 30 second video limit before the camera automatically shut off.  I found the same thing....and then noted that I had put in a slow SD card.  The class 10 card that came with this package was just the ticket and allowed me to shoot high quality video without a problem.  The slower card can still be used for hi-resolution stills.I would not hesitate to deal with "The Imaging World" again, and I would certainly recommend the Canon T3i!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Patrick K Whitmore
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife and she loves it. This kit included only the items I needed.  Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Everything required for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Blackcat
Reviews.Content: A very nice camera for the money. Light weight but sturdy. The lenses are nice for a beginner. Great fact that it comes with two batteries and the bag and two lenses. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: bama75
Reviews.Content: for the price you cant beat what you get the second battery is not cannon but last just as long the UV lenses work well for protecting the lenses if it is your first SLR be sure to research how to use it. it has some complicated functions but if you learn them it takes unbelieveable photos

Reviews.Title: Look and shoot like a Pro
Reviews.Author: John OToole
Reviews.Content: This camera makes a rank amateur look like professional.  I took some great pictures this fall and the auto focus and various settings allow you to be very creative.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light
Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2) for shooting at high or low angles and 1,040,000-dot VGA with reflection reduction
Video Snapshot features for enhanced video shooting options
Comes with camera body, EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II lens, eyecup, wide strap, USB cable, AV cable, battery, and charger
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II + Canon 75-300mm III Lens + Large Camera and Lens Case + 8 GB Card + Card Reader + Extra Battery Pack + 2 58mm UV Filters + Memory Card Wallet + Cleaning Kit
